DOC.criteria: 1 . 1 . Age 18 year old 2 . Patients multiple myeloma undergo autologous peripheral blood stem cell transplantation PBPC cell collection without chemopriming . 3 . Platelet count > 100,000/ul prior first apheresis procedure 7 . Patients receive prior chemotherapy . Only patient treat thalidomide , bortezomib , +/ dexamethasone eligible . 8 .
